description:
It’s time for some fun in the sun during summer break, only Serene doesn’t seem too keen on the idea. Time to help out the dorm’s most mysterious member!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Serene la recluse / Le foyer Déesse part en voyage
Serene the Shut-in / The Goddess Dormitory Goes on Vacation
Serene zieht sich zurück / Das Göttinen-Wohnheim geht auf reisen
Serene, Hikikomoru / Megami-ryou, Ryokou e Iku
せれね, ひきこもる / 女神寮, 旅行へ行く
